import numpy as np

def max_abs_difference(arr):
    max_val = np.max(arr)
    min_val = np.min(arr)
    max_diff = np.abs(max_val + min_val)
    return max_diff

import numpy as np

def max_abs_difference(arr):
    max_val = np.max(arr)
    min_val = np.min(arr)
    max_diff = np.abs(max_val * min_val)
    return max_diff
